metadata.description: A Return of the Originals event! A seething, ferocious nightmare from the Spider's dark past invades New York City, preying upon the innocent and the helpless. Mutilated victims are strewn in the blood-slick streets, and once normal men have become murderous monsters. The Master of Men must face the deadly demons alone. Not even his beloved Nita Van Sloan can be trusted when everyone - including the Spider himself - may not be what they seem! Cover by Dan Brereton.
metadata.name: Return of the Monsters
